thread.title: EastEnders' Lisa Hammond: Donna and Fatboy are a 'great match'
thread.title_full: EastEnders' Lisa Hammond: Donna and Fatboy are a 'great match'

title: EastEnders' Lisa Hammond: Donna and Fatboy are a 'great match'
text:
EastEnders' Lisa Hammond: Donna and Fatboy are a 'great match' EastEnders' Lisa Hammond: Donna and Fatboy are a 'great match' 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
EastEnders’ actress Lisa Hammond is hoping there will be more romance between her character Donna Yates and Arthur “Fatboy” Chubb. 
Viewers of the BBC soap will see a softer side to the market trader when Donna and Fatboy (played by Ricky Norwood) enjoy a kiss in the October 13 episode. Donna and Fatboy kiss in EastEnders (Kieron McCarron/BBC) 
The actress told Inside Soap: “Fatboy has got a bit of an edge to him, but he’s very nice. Donna’s probably gone for a flash guy in the past, but Fats is kind-hearted and he can handle her attitude as well. 
“They’re good mates, so I think they’d make a great match.” 
Lisa said the kissing scene – her first on the show – had its challenges. 
“It was actually really funny, as things kept going wrong in the studio every time we went to kiss. A light cracked, and then we kept having to redo it through various problems like that,” she explained. Donna and Fatboy in EastEnders (Kieron McCarron/BBC) 
She continued: “Myself and Ricky just resigned ourselves to the fact that we would have to keep kissing over and over!” 
Lisa credited her co-star for making the scenes comfortable. 
“It’s my first screen kiss for EastEnders so initially it did feel a bit ‘Woah’. But our director was brilliant and Ricky is so professional that it wasn’t a big deal,” she said. Share article 
“I’ve worked on other shows in the past where I’ve had to snog someone – after only having known the actor for a day! What’s been lovely this time is that I’ve been able to spend the last year and a half with Ricky, getting to know him.” Promoted Stories
